Subject: Tennis
data: 1 Who among the following has won the men's singles title of the Wimbledon tennis tournament 2015? A Roger Federer B Andy Murray C Novak Djokovic D Stan Wawrinka Answer: Option [C]
2 Who among the following has won the women's singles title of the Wimbledon tennis tournament 2015? A Serena Williams B Maria Sharapova C Simona Halep D Ana Ivanovic Answer: Option [A]

3 The Australian Open tennis tournament 2015 took place in which of the following venues? A Queensland Tennis Centre B Melbourne Park C Eastcourts Tennis Club D Orange Indoor Tennis Centre Answer: Option [B]
4 Who was the winner of men's singles in Australian Open tennis tournament 2015? A Andy Murray B Novak Djokovic C Roger Federer D Rafael Nadal Answer: Option [B]
5 Who was the winner of women's singles in Australian Open tennis tournament 2015? A Petra Kvitová B Agnieszka Radwańska C Caroline Wozniacki D Serena Williams Answer: Option [D]

6 In which of the following venues US Open tennis tournament 2015 took place? A West Side Tennis Club B USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center C Arthur Ashe Stadium D Newport Casino Answer: Option [B]
7 Which of the following players is the winner of women's title of US Open tennis tournament 2015? A Flavia Pennetta B Serena Williams C Simona Halep D Roberta Vinci Answer: Option [A]
8 Which of the following players is the winner of men's title of US Open tennis tournament 2015? A Roger Federer B Novak Djokovic C Gilles Simon D Marin Čilić Answer: Option [B]
9 Who is the winner of men's singles title in French Open tennis tournament 2015? A Stan Wawrinka B David Ferrer C Tomáš Berdych D Rafael Nadal Answer: Option [A]

10 Which of the following players is the winner of women's singles title in French Open tennis tournament 2015? A Eugenie Bouchard B Ekaterina Makarova C Serena Williams D Ana Ivanovic Answer: Option [C]
